summary: You can add your author info in any source files,such as cpp,c,java,and c#.
name: AuthorInfo
description:
You can add your author info in any source files,such as cpp,c,java,and c#.
Like this:
/*=============================================================================
#
#   Author: 		DanteZhu - dantezhu@vip.qq.com
#
#   HomePage: 		http://www.vimer.cn
#
#   Last modified:	2009-12-27 19:19
#
#   Filename:		
#
#   Description: 	
#
=============================================================================*/

when you type <F4>,this will add in the head of your source file,and when you type <F4> again,It will update automatically.

My homepage is http://www.vimer.cn,and wellcome。
install_details: Put this file in the vim plugins directory (~/.vim/plugin/) to load it automatically.
